inputs.content: the number of marijuana plants in Bradley's marijuana patch was >= 3
Bradley's marijuana patch was in a yard accessible from a house that did not belong to Bradley
Bradley's marijuana patch was entirely hidden by foliage
Bradley's marijuana patch was covered by nontransparent material
part of Bradley's marijuana patch was in plain sight from a distance of >= 1 foot
the distance between Bradley's marijuana patch and Bradley's house was >= 20 feet
Part of Bradley's marijuana patch was in plain sight from a distance of as >= 1 foot
a house that did not belong to Bradley had access to the rear yard where Bradley's marijuana patch was located

despite.content: Bradley's marijuana patch was partially hidden by foliage
Bradley's marijuana patch was in the fenced rear yard of Bradley's house

outputs.content: Bradley exhibited an expectation of privacy in Bradley's marijuana patch
